1.content: Migrate Shopify Customer Data to Unified User Profiles
1.details: Migrate 2,819 customers from the customers table to user_profiles table. Map fields appropriately, handle data transformation, and ensure no data loss. Preserve existing relationships and maintain data integrity.

2.details: Build the style_profiles table and associated functionality. Include style preferences, fashion knowledge base integration, personalized recommendations, and style analytics. Design for scalability and user engagement.

3.details: Create a comprehensive fashion knowledge base system that helps users discover their personal style. Include style categories, trend analysis, personalized recommendations, and learning algorithms.

4.details: Create seamless data synchronization between user_profiles, customers, and wedding systems. Ensure consistent user experience across all platform areas with real-time updates.

5.details: Build frontend interfaces for enhanced profile creation, style profiling, and profile management. Include intuitive UX for style discovery, preference setting, and profile completion.

6.content: Integrate with Existing Email & Wedding Systems
6.details: Connect the enhanced profile system with existing SendGrid email service and comprehensive wedding management system. Ensure seamless user experience across all touchpoints.

7.details: End-to-end testing of data migration, enhanced profiling, style recommendations, and system integration. Validate performance, data integrity, and user experience.
